plays.text: Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Alexander Karpovtsev and Steve Sullivan
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for Crosschecking MARC BERGEVIN
Goal scored by Jamal Mayers assisted by Cory Stillman and Scott Mellanby
Penalty to Sergei Varlamov 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Eric Daze
Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Interference Alexander Khavanov
Penalty to Cory Stillman 2 minutes for High Sticking Alexander Karpovtsev
Penalty to Dallas Drake 2 minutes for High Sticking JIM CAMPBELL
Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Crosschecking Pavol Demitra
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Boarding Kyle Calder
Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Pavol Demitra
Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Interference Jamal Mayers
